ProjectTitle: Optical genome mapping for comprehensive genetic analysis of  sarcomas in a diagnostic setting.
InitialFeedbackHistory: 29/06/2023 [REDACTED] human genomic data please use EGA (https://ega-archive.org/) instead of GEO; pseudonymous patient details still fall under the GDPR and can also not be made publicly available, if you can't anonymize them you can use KU [REDACTED] RDR (https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr/rdr) to share the metadata and restrict acces to the data which can be made available upon signing a transfer agreement. Please contact dac@uzleuven.be to check the best approach for data sharing
label: good with suggestions
